TADS 3 Library: disambiguation

This module defines classes related to resolving ambiguity in noun phrases in command input.

Summary of Classes  

DisambigException DisambigOrdinalOutOfRangeException DisambigRanking DisambigResolver DisambigResults Distinguisher InteractiveResolver StillAmbiguousException UnmatchedDisambigException
